name: JUSTANEGG
description: What is the project about? Welcome to JustAnEgg, the only cryptocurrency project that’s egg-ceptionally good! We believe in the versatility and dynamism of the humble egg as a model for the financial world. What makes your project unique? Egg Swap will be our one of a kind lending protocol that loans ethereum for users to make the swap! History of your project. Whether you’re looking to trade, hold, or cook up a tasty breakfast, JustAnEgg has got you covered. But don’t let our lighthearted approach fool you - we take security and transparency seriously. Our goal is to reach the meme coins top 5 by setting high standards, building meaningful partnerships as well as a strong community of supporters. Our project is built on top of the most advanced blockchain technology, incorporating top-notch encryption and security measures to ensure the safety and security of your tokens. What’s next for your project? Website & socials launch • $EGG Token Creation and smart contract development (audited) • Dextool launch • Listing on CoinGecko & Coinmarketcap • Renounce ownership of the Smart Contract • 1,000 Hold Achieving market penetration • Building brand awareness • Targeting new audiences with social media activations • Building a community • 10,000 Holders • Listing on major cryptocurrency exchanges (CEX) • Egg Swap: the egg that gives you gas • The egg-spectations are high and anything can hatch! • 100,000 Holders | $1B Market Cap • Top 5 Meme Coin What can your token be used for? The $EGG token plans to grow and create value by continuously innovating and improving its features and utilities, increasing adoption through strategic partnerships and marketing efforts, and building a strong community of supporters and contributors. The project aims to offer unique and exciting opportunities for token holders, as well as contribute to the broader ecosystem of decentralized finance and blockchain technology.
